dive Shot layed under a conrol panel as he tryed hes best to get what 
little systems that weren't blowed apart working again "sure leave me 
to do all the work" he thought "they go running off after Blade and i 
get all the work, and besides this is Pantra's job but nooooo she 
gets to go on the recon" he grumbed to himself as he connected 2 
wires together and the lights slowly flashed on "there now that we 
got power , i can see what we got to work with" he said getting to 
his feet and started to type commands into the computer "this Dive 
Shot to any maxiaml outposts or ship in range of this channel, your 
ship has crashed on a planet and our ship is in no shape for flight, 
i repeat our ship as crashed" he said into the computer "plz 
responded if your picking up this message"


OOC: any maximal and respond to the message if they feel like it
